content: Today's Computer Networks lab (2:00-4:00 PM) has been moved to Lab-4 due to maintenance work in Lab-2.
আজ বিকাল ৩টায় প্রিন্সিপাল স্যারের সাথে ছাত্র প্রতিনিধিদের বৈঠক অনুষ্ঠিত হবে। সংশ্লিষ্ট সবাই উপস্থিত থাকবেন।
Free COVID-19 vaccination camp will be organized in the campus medical center from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM today. Bring your ID card.
Dr. Rahman's Machine Learning class (9:00-10:30 AM) is cancelled today due to his emergency leave. Makeup class will be announced later.
Canteen menu today: Chicken Biriyani (120 TK), Beef Curry with Rice (100 TK), Vegetable Curry (80 TK), Fish Fry (90 TK).
Lost and Found: A black leather wallet found near the library entrance. Contact the admin office to claim with proper identification.
পরীক্ষার হলে মোবাইল ফোন আনা সম্পূর্ণ নিষিদ্ধ। কোন ছাত্র-ছাত্রী মোবাইল নিয়ে পরীক্ষার হলে প্রবেশ করলে তার বিরুদ্ধে শাস্তিমূলক ব্যবস্থা নেওয়া হবে।
Today's Database lab practical exam will start at 2:00 PM sharp. Students must arrive 15 minutes early for attendance and seating arrangement.
Water supply will be temporarily disrupted in the east wing from 12:00 PM to 2:00 PM for pipeline maintenance. Please plan accordingly.
New Year celebration program has been scheduled for 4:00 PM at the main ground. Cultural performances, games, and refreshments will be arranged.
Bus service timing updated: First bus at 7:30 AM, last bus at 6:30 PM. Additional buses available during exam period.
Security reminder: Please always carry your student ID card and show it to guards when entering the campus. Visitors must register at the main gate.
